									</span>

										</md-icon>
									</md-button>
									<md-button ng-if="!item.leaf && !!item.children" class="md-icon-button  md-squared" ng-click="item.children = null">

									</md-button>
								</p>
							</div>

								<md-list-item ng-repeat="child in item.children"    ng-click="common.goTo(child.container,child.port, child.change_url);common.toggleNavigation('menuItems')"   ng-if="child.text"  dib-selected >
									<md-icon ng-if="item.icon" md-svg-icon="{{child.icon}}">
